headline: $1B Ex-Ameriprise Team Sets Up Shop at NewEdge Advisors
summary: NewEdge Advisors, one of two RIA practices in the NewEdge Capital Group, has added 14-person Seven Bridges Wealth Advisors in White Plains, N.Y.

headline: 478 Ameriprise Financial Advisor Teams Named to the Forbes "Best-in-State Wealth Management Teams" List
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, February 24, 2026--Ameriprise Financial announced 478 of the firm’s financial advisor practices were named to the Forbes "Best-in-State Wealth Management Teams" list
